headline: Eversource Energy (ES) Raises its Quarterly Dividend to $0.7875 per Share
summary: Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) is included among the 10 High Yield Utility Stocks to Buy in 2026. Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) operates New England’s largest energy delivery system and serves customers in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire. Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) announced on January 27 that its Board of Trustees has approved a quarterly dividend of $0.7875 per […]
